import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from "axios"; import { APIpaths } from "../API"; export default function DashboardInventory() { const [items, setItems] = useState(); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`${APIpaths.getAllItems}?page=1&limit=10`) .then((res) => setItems(res.data.results)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }); return (

1 Alpha Otto 32
2 Breeze Thornton International 24
3 Zeffer Munchen Plastics 19
); }
